name: heal-bell
caption: Heal Bell

effect.short: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
effect.full: Removes [major status effects]{mechanic:major-status-effects} and [confusion]{mechanic:confusion} from every Pokémon in the user's party.

flavorText:
The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the
status conditions of all the party Pokémon.
